title: Threads
summaries: Threads are crafting materials used primarily in vanity items.

• Black Thread and Pink Thread are purchased from the Clothier.
  • Green Thread and Purple Thread are crafted.
  • White Thread is crafted, and is only available in the [img:Japanese Console version] Japanese Console version. White Thread replaces Green Thread in all [img:Japanese Console version] Japanese Console crafting recipes. The Japanese Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version has Purple Thread as in the US.
